name: Panzer Campaigns 3:  Kharkov '42
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Kharkov '42, an operational level World War II simulation. Kharkov '42 covers the Soviet Spring offensive of 1942 and the attempt to retake the key strategic city of  Kharkov.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
  • 官方网站: http://www.hpssims.com/Pages/Products/PZC/PZC_kharkv/panzer_campaigns_kharkov_42.html
